children.text:
Important: These are the mobile terms of use ("Terms") for the CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC Mobile Platform owned and/or operated by Smarter Agent, LLC ("Smarter Agent"). It is important that you read and accept these Terms prior to accessing, downloading or otherwise using an Application and the related software, data or technology used, stored, licensed or accessed with an Application and the related intellectual property embodied therein. Your use of an Application indicates that you accept these Terms. General. The CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC Mobile Platform is owned and/or operated by Smarter Agent and is intended for personal use. Any commercial use of the Services is limited to transactions done on your behalf, or by CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC Real Estate Brokers or Agents or other third parties that have separately licensed use of the Services from Smarter Agent under a written license agreement.
Real Estate Data. You agree that (1) access to an Application is subject to all Multiple Listing Service ("MLS"), National Association of REALTORS ("NAR"), and State and Federal regulations governing real estate transactions; (2) you have a bona fide interest in the purchase, sale, or lease of real estate of the type being accessed through an Application; (3) you will not copy, redistribute or retransmit any of the data or information provided by CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC; and (4) you acknowledge the MLS's ownership of and the validity of the copyright in the MLS database. Disclaimer. Information available through an Application is deemed to be reliable but not guaranteed. All real estate listings are marked with the logo of the MLS providing the listing and detailed information about each listing includes the listing broker/agent name as required by the local MLS. 
The listing broker has attempted to offer accurate data, but buyers are advised to confirm all items. Some properties which appear for sale within an Application may no longer be available because they are under contract, have sold or are no longer being offered for sale. The listings of some real estate firms do not appear within an Application. Some properties listed with firms contributing listings to an Application do not appear at the request of the seller. Scheduling an Appointment; Getting More Information. Smarter Agent on behalf of CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC records each "For Sale Property" viewed by you using an Application. Whenever you select "Call To See" to schedule an appointment to view a property, you are providing Smarter Agent with the express permission to share the related For Sale Property with CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC real estate brokers/agents even if your call is not completed.
Specific question about a property viewed within applications can only be answered by a licensed CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC real estate agent. Use of GPS and Location information: Smarter Agent collects location information that is made available to us solely by virtue of our relationship with you, and this information may be considered Customer Proprietary Network Information (CPNI). To the extent this information is considered CPNI, we acknowledge that you have a right, and we have a duty, under the federal and state law, to protect the confidentiality of your CPNI. By using this service, you expressly accept and consent to Smarter Agent accessing, collecting, using and maintaining your location data to provide the services available with CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC's Mobile Platform and consent to the disclosure and display of your location data to you and third parties to provide the services. 
You may keep your location information private by withdrawing your consent by deleting this application to cancel your subscription to CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC Mobile Platform. We collect certain information about you, that includes phone number when your register for the Application. We may use this information to send out text messages to you informing you of application updates or enhancements. CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC and Smarter Agent may revise these Terms at any time, with or without notice to you. (5) Telephone Charges: You are responsible for payment of all charges that are imposed by your wireless carrier. Subscription to an Application does not relieve you of the requirement to pay any voice, data or other charges assessed by your wireless carrier. The CENTURY 21 Real Estate LLC Mobile Platform offering is intended to provide you with the ability to obtain more information in a text message.
You must have an SMS/text messaging-enabled mobile phone to utilize this capability. Currently, the following wireless carriers are supported: - Alltel - AT&T - Cellular One - Nextel/Boost - Sprint - T-Mobile - US Cellular - Verizon Wireless - Virgin Mobile. We do not charge users for this service, but standard message charges or other charges from our wireless carrier likely do apply. You may opt out of the C21 Mobile Real Estate App text message service that you may receive for App updates at any time by texting STOP from your mobile phone. We will unsubscribe you from our text messaging service immediately.
You should visit SAs privacy policy and general terms of use are incorporated herein by reference as if fully stated herein: http://www.smarteragent.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=70. Your use of an Application is deemed acceptance of these policies.We recognize that maintaining the privacy of your personal information is important, and for this reason we do not share any of your personal information with third parties without your consent. We will not sell your personal information to any third-party or share your information with telemarketing companies or direct mail companies, and adhere to principles of mutual respect.
